data.name: No One Survived
data.detailed_description:
This is a survival sandbox game. Always pay attention to your character status and those dangerous zombies. You need to explore and collect useful materials and build a shelter in the apocalypse.
Learn the necessary knowledge, such as: medicine, electrical chemistry, tailoring, metallurgy, civil engineering, weapons manufacturing, etc.
Use this knowledge to build more high-tech equipment to help you survive in this world.

Included in the game:
open world map
multiplayer support
variety of wild animals
Abandoned towns, military bases and more to explore
four seasons
Every once in a while the corpse tide attack
data.about_the_game:
This is a survival sandbox game. Always pay attention to your character status and those dangerous zombies. You need to explore and collect useful materials and build a shelter in the apocalypse.
Learn the necessary knowledge, such as: medicine, electrical chemistry, tailoring, metallurgy, civil engineering, weapons manufacturing, etc.

data.short_description: This is a multiplayer cooperative open world construction survival sandbox game, where you and your friends must find supplies and build shelters in this world. You have to keep an eye on your character's needs state at all times, a bad state is likely to lead to death.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Please note that! There is a lot of blood in the game and the effect of amputation.
